articles.title: Astronomers Detect Heartbeat Of A Supermassive Black Hole That Is Still Beating - Mashable India
articles.description: About 13 years ago, astronomers detected a black hole’s heartbeat for the first time. In a new study, researchers have confirmed that the heartbeat from the cosmic entity is still going strong.
